attributes.action: Wishing for the people of Eng/UK a bank holiday if we are to win World Cup 2018.
attributes.additional_details: Previous evidence of other impromptu national bank holidays are when we have celebrated Royal Weddings which creates great happiness and morale around the United Kingdom and I feel this will be a great way to create this atmosphere once again.
attributes.background: I wish the people of England/Great Britain a national bank holiday if England are to win the World Cup 2018 hosted in Russia. The national bank holiday will be on Monday 16th July 2018. I feel it will be a great way to celebrate this country’s great achievement which hasn’t happened in 52 years!!
